betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Now that you can craft the Impetus Conductor, combine the Impetus Cell and Thaumic Plate in the Arcane Workbench to obtain the Impetus Conductor.

Next, combine the Impetus Conductor with either a Mystic Mage's Gauntlet or a Void Mage's Gauntlet in any crafting interface to craft a Mage's Gauntlet with the Impetus Conductor. When you hold this gauntlet and approach a Void Rift, you will absorb the rift's energy (Impetus Energy)
